commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
name: Docker Image CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout Repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v4.1.1

    - name: Login to Docker Hub
      uses: docker/login-action@v3.0.0
      with:
        username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_ACCOUNT }}
        password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_TOKEN }}
          

    - name: Build and Push Docker Nextcloud Image
      working-directory: ansible/images/nextcloud
      run: |
        docker build -t nextcloud .
        docker tag nextcloud sysperu/nextcloud
        docker push sysperu/nextcloud
    
    - name: Build and Push Docker Postgres Image
      working-directory: ansible/images/postgres
      run: |
        docker build -t postgres .
        docker tag postgres sysperu/postgres
        docker push sysperu/postgres
